#summary Battleships Product Backlog
#labels backlog
*User & AI*

As a User I can start the application on my phone so I can play my favorite game.

As a User I can see the game menu so I can choose what to do next.

As a User I can see the current application version, authors, game website in “About Screen” so that I know useful info about the game.

As a User I can see “Options Screen” so I know that I can configure my game experience.

As a User I can turn on and off game sound so I can play on silent places (at work, at class)

As a User I can turn off and on vibration so if I don’t like it any more I can turn it off.

As a User I can quit the game when I don’t have time to play.

As a User I can start new battleship game so I can play finally.

As a User I can choose my AI opponent so he matches my skill.

As a User I can arrange my ships so enemy will not find them easy.

As a User I can choose auto arrange ships so when I’m lazy the game will arrange them for me.

As an AI I can arrange my ships with some algorithm so I can play with User.

As a User I can shoot so I can destroy enemy’s ships.

As an AI I can shoot with some algorithm so I can shoot User’s ships.

As a User I can destroy all enemy’s ships so I can win.

As an AI I can destroy all User’s ships so I can win.

As an AI can wait some time so User can decide where to shoot.

As a User i can play the game with some of my friends
